title: V8 (JavaScript engine)
summary: V8 is an open-source JavaScript engine developed by the Chromium Project for Google Chrome and Chromium web browsers.[5] The projectâ€™s creator is Lars Bak.[6] The first version of the V8 engine was released at the same time as the first version of Chrome: 2 September 2008. It has also been used on the server side, for example in Couchbase and Node.js.
